snippet: The Russia soccer federation asked its fans to show restraint ahead of Saturday’s game with Greece. Clashes between Polish and Russian fans on Tuesday caused property damage and injuries.
abstract: Russian soccer federation asks its fans to show restraint ahead of the game with Greece, after clashes between Polish and Russian fans caused property damage and injuries in an earlier match at the European championship.
lead_paragraph: The Russia soccer federation asked its fans to show restraint ahead of Saturday’s game with Greece. Clashes between Polish and Russian fans on Tuesday caused property damage and injuries.

headline.seo: Euro 2012: Russian Hooliganism Looms Over Soccer Tournament
headline.main: Threat of Russian Hooliganism Looms Over Championships
headline.print_headline: Threat of Russian Hooliganism Looms Over Championships
